attributes.action: Investigate the abuse of human rights in Palestine
attributes.additional_details:
We are continuing to see the atrocities that Israel is commiting on a daily basis clearly abusing the human rights of the Palestinian people.

We would like to see the government of the UK take  action against Israel who is breaking international law and the geneva convention by illegally occupying Palestian terrority and illegally detaining Palestinians and subjecting them to torture and abusing their human rights.

We would like to see the government investigate the acts of war that Israel is commiting against an unarmed population who are unable to take arms against the aggressors.

We would like to see the government investigate Israel who is illegally detaining Palestinian children and civilians which is a clear breach of the Geneva convention which established protections for the civilians and non combatants.
